docs.text: body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center; height: 100vh; background-color: #f4f4f4; } .button { display: inline-block; padding: 10px 20px; border: none; border-radius: 10px; background-color: #3498db; color: #ffffff; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; font-size: 16px; cursor: pointer; transition: background-color 0.3s; } .button:hover { background-color: #e74c3c; } .arrow-box { margin-top: 20px; display: flex; align-items: center; } .arrow { width: 0; height: 0; border-style: solid; border-width: 20px 0 20px 30px; border-color: transparent transparent transparent #3498db; border-radius: 10px; margin-right: 10px; } .approval-text { padding: 10px; background-color: #3498db; border-radius: 10px; color: #ffffff; font-size: 16px; } Crie um pedido de serviço Espere aprovação do pedido
